content.raw:
I can confirm I was able to fix this by running:

```
./run.bash subt_shell
git clone https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign.git
catkin_make install
ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4
```

At which point I had odometry data and 3D LIDAR data for the X1 platform. So it seems that issues like #87 and #79 will be resolved when the `ros1-ign-bridge` debian package is fixed.
content.html:
I can confirm I was able to fix this by running:

./run.bash subt_shell
git clone https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign.git
catkin_make install
ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4

At which point I had odometry data and 3D LIDAR data for the X1 platform. So it seems that issues like #87 and #79 will be resolved when the ros1-ign-bridge debian package is fixed.
